Question: RebuilderAI Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
RebuilderAI Inc.

Product: VRIN 3D

- AI-based 3D content creating solution
- Users can create 3D content by capturing surrounding objects and space on smartphones
- AI technology recreates real objects into 3D pictures
- Mobile device application for scanning various objects such as products and parts
- Improved 3D content quality and automated process
- Latest version automatically retouches material, mesh, and styling of 3D model
- Aim to expand to B2C market in the future
- Received the Innovation Award in the “Mobile Devices & Apps” category at CES 2024
Summary_cn:
RebuilderAI公司

产品：VRIN 3D

- 基于人工智能的3D内容创建解决方案
- 用户可以通过在智能手机上捕捉周围对象和空间来创建3D内容
- AI技术将真实物体重现为3D图片
- 移动设备应用程序，可扫描各种对象，如产品和零件
- 改进了3D内容质量和自动化流程
- 最新版本可以自动修饰3D模型的材料、网格和风格
- 未来的目标是拓展到B2C市场
- 在2024年CES展会的“移动设备与应用程序”类别中获得创新奖
